thread.title: NFL Week 5 point spreads, over/under: Bills a 3-point favorite against Titans
thread.title_full: NFL Week 5 point spreads, over/under: Bills a 3-point favorite against Titans | syracuse.com

author: Matthew Fairburn | mfairburn@syracuse.com
title: NFL Week 5 point spreads, over/under: Bills a 3-point favorite against Titans
text:
For the second straight week, the Buffalo Bills open up as favorites, this time favored by three points over the Tennessee Titans on the road.
In their first game as the favorite, the Bills were embarrassed in a 24-10 loss to the New York Giants. The Titans aren't the most imposing of opponents. They have a 1-2 record and are starting a rookie quarterback, but they are fresh off a bye week heading into their Week 5 matchup with the Bills.
In five games, the Bills now have three opponents who had a long week to prepare.
Below are the odds for NFL games next week courtesy of America's Line.
